artist: Artist: Hans (Jean) Arp; Author: Hans (Jean) Arp; Translator: Ralph Manheim; Printer: Fequet et Baudier, Paris, France; Publisher: Curt Valentine, New York
description: Loose volume containing an introductory text (printed in English, French, and German), a set of 28 numbered and titled prints, and a separate suite of 28 un-numbered prints (available only for the first 25 copies of the edition).
image_copyright: © Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York %2F ADAGP%2C Paris
inscription: Inscribed in pencil on the inside cover, ULC: DXXX | 6 x 4
markings: Numbered in pencil on cover of the extra suite of prints, LRC: 10/25
medium: Woodcuts in black and blue-gray; letterpress
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed:
Signed and dated in pencil on cover of extra suite of prints: Arp │10/25.

title: Dreams and Projects
